Bloodline of Chin "the Conqueror"

Chin was a warlord who aimed to overthrow the 46th Earth King and launched a largely successful conquest of the Earth Kingdom, conquering most of the continent until his downfall at the hands of Avatar Kyoshi.
Charactors tend to be Ambitious.
Chin was the most ambitious conqueror the Earthkingom had ever known. He sought to unite the fractured Earthkingdom and he did so with great success till his death at the hands of Avatar Kyoshi.
Can I live up to Chin's dream?
Royal Blood of the Hou-Ting

The Hou-Tings are a prestigious family, tracing there lineage back to the very first Earth Kings. Only able to enforce there authority within the walls of Ba Sing Se, the Earth Kingdom has become autonomous and lax under there rule.
The Tyrannical Blood of the Hao

Founders of the Earth Kingdom, the Hao united the squabbling states of the continent to become the First Earth Kings. They ruled with an iron fist, that not only extended to there enemies, but to there own dynasty.
The Blood of Peasants

During the waning days of the Hao, a prominent peasant leader by the name of Ting successfully overthrew the last Hao Earth King to become the new monarch of the Earth Kingdom. After there rise to power, they slowly ignored ruling and gave into there personal pleasures, leaving the kingdom without proper leadership.

Blood of Illjaujait
The Illaujait chieftians were the first to unite the tribes of the north into a unified nation, forming the Northern Water Tribe.
Blood of Atanniupaa

The Atanniupaa are a noble clan from the Northern Water Tribe. Highly respected for there leadership, they eventually became chiefs of the Northern Water Tribe following the death of the last Illjaujait chiefs.
Blood of Taima

The Taima are a noble clan from the Southern water tribe. One of the most prominent among the south, they are renowned for there skilled craftsmanship, shrewd leadership abilities, and perilous wit in the face of overpowering danger.
Blood of Hakaku
Firelord Hakaku was the first man to unite the Fire Islands into one nation.
These characters tend to be Lightningbenders
Blood of the Sun

The sun warriors were the first to master the art of firebending directly from the dragons. Although they now live in secrecy, there connection to the dragons makes them more powerful and pious than the average firebender.
Blood of Avatar Kyoshi

Avatar Kyoshi was the Avatar who succeeded Kuruk. During her tenure as Avatar, she stabilized the Earth Kingdom by putting down various rebellions and later compromised with the Earth King to create a new constitution, as well as founding the infamous Dai Li. She later retired to her island, dying at an old age
Blood of Avatar Kuruk

Avatar Kuruk was the Avatar who succeeded Yangchen. Living in a time of tranquility due to his predecessor, he stepped back from the role of the avatar, letting the four nation's sort out there own differences. He later died at the young age of 33 with a world in strife and chaos.
Blood of Avatar Yangchen

Avatar Yangchen was the Avatar before Kuruk. During her tenure, she was eager to make a difference in the world despite her inexperience, eventually becoming a respected figure, hailed for her wisdom, determination, and power.
